database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseDelete, DatabaseGetSelect, DatabaseInsert, DatabaseSelect, DatabaseUpdate

    public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class is the parent of all database classes. It contains the behavior of making a connection and closing it.
    Author:
